trans-unit.source: "Well, maybe yes under some weird set of circumstances that aren't immediately obvious to me... but if I encountered this in real code then I would use common debugging techniques to figure out how and why it was doing what it was doing and then immediately refactor the code to avoid that situation... but more importantly: I would absolutely NEVER write that code in the first place because that is the very definition of convoluted code, and I strive to never write convoluted code".
trans-unit.target: "嗯,也许是的,在一些对我来说并不明显的奇怪情况下是的......但如果我在真实的代码中遇到这种情况,我会使用常见的调试技术来弄清楚它是如何和为什么会做这样的事情,然后立即重构代码来避免这种情况......但更重要的是,我绝对不会写出这样的代码。我绝对不会在一开始就写这种代码,因为这就是混乱的代码的定义,我努力做到永远不写混乱的代码"。

trans-unit.source: Encoding: In this case the variable you are looking at is not the one you think it is. This can happen if you intentionally mess around with Unicode using homoglyphs or space characters to make the name of a variable look like another one, but encoding issues can also be introduced accidentally, e.g. when copying & pasting code from the Web that contains unexpected Unicode code points (e.g. because a content management system did some "auto-formatting" such as replacing fl with Unicode 'LATIN SMALL LIGATURE FL' (U+FB02)).
trans-unit.target: 编码：在这种情况下，您正在查看的变量不是您认为的变量。如果您故意使用象形文字或空格字符使Unicode 变乱，以使变量名看起来像另一个变量，则可能会发生这种情况，但是编码问题也可能会偶然引入，例如，从Web复制和粘贴包含意外Unicode代码的代码时点（例如，因为内容管理系统进行了一些“自动格式化”，例如用Unicode“拉丁文小写FL”（U + FB02）替换 fl ）。

trans-unit.source: Moderator note: Please resist the urge to edit the code or remove this notice. The pattern of whitespace may be part of the question and therefore should not be tampered with unnecessarily. If you are in the "whitespace is insignificant" camp, you should be able to accept the code as is.
trans-unit.target: 主持人注意：请不要编辑代码或删除此声明。空格模式可能是问题的一部分，因此不应不必要地对其进行篡改。如果您处于“空白无关紧要”的阵营中，则应该能够原样接受代码。

trans-unit.source: Race conditions: A race-condition might occur, i.e. a situation where code is not executing in the sequence expected by the developer. Race conditions often happen in multi-threaded code, but multiple threads are not a requirement for race conditions to be possible – asynchronicity is sufficient (and don't get confused, async does not mean multiple threads are used under the hood).
trans-unit.target: 竞争条件：可能发生竞争条件，即未按照开发人员期望的顺序执行代码的情况。竞态条件通常发生在多线程代码中，但是竞态条件才可能需要多个线程–异步性就足够了（不要感到困惑，异步并不意味着在后台使用了多个线程）。

trans-unit.source: Side-effects: A side-effect of the equality comparison operation (which doesn't have to be as obvious as in the examples here, often side-effects are very subtle).
trans-unit.target: 副作用：相等比较操作的副作用（不必像此处的示例那样明显，副作用通常非常微妙）。

trans-unit.source: 1 For example, you can find an example in a totally different programming language (C#) exhibiting a side-effect (an obvious one) here.
trans-unit.target: 1举例来说，你可以找到在一个完全不同的编程语言（C＃）的例子显示出副作用（一个明显的例子）在这里。

trans-unit.source: As with most of the other answers, this only works with a loose equality check (==), because strict equality checks (===) do not do type coercion that the Proxy can intercept.

trans-unit.source: Creating a dummy object with a custom valueOf that increments a global variable i on each call. 23 characters!
trans-unit.target: 创建一个具有自定义 valueOf 的虚拟对象，该对象将在每次调用时增加全局变量 i 。23个字符！

trans-unit.source: Don't do this. Seriously.
trans-unit.target: 不要这样做。我是认真的。

trans-unit.source: Due to == usage, JavaScript is supposed to coerce a into something close to the second operand (1, 2, 3 in this case). But before JavaScript tries to figure coercing on its own, it tries to call Symbol.toPrimitive. If you provide Symbol.toPrimitive JavaScript would use the value your function returns. If not, JavaScript would call valueOf.
trans-unit.target: 由于 == 用法，JavaScript是应该强迫 a 弄成靠近第二操作数（ 1 ， 2 ， 3 在这种情况下）。但是在JavaScript尝试自行计算强制之前，它会尝试调用 Symbol.toPrimitive 。如果提供 Symbol.toPrimitive ,则 JavaScript将使用函数返回的值。如果没有，JavaScript将调用 valueOf 。

trans-unit.source: Edit: It has come to my attention that (although not allowed to start a variable) the Zero-width joiner and Zero-width non-joiner characters are also permitted in variable names - see Obfuscating JavaScript with zero-width characters - pros and cons?.

trans-unit.source: I guess some interviewers would take offense to having what is obviously meant to be a very tricky question called out, but I don't mind developers who have an opinion, especially when they can back it up with reasoned thought and can dovetail my question into a meaningful statement about themselves.
trans-unit.target: 我想,有些面试官会反感把明明是一个很棘手的问题叫出来,但我并不介意那些有意见的开发者,尤其是当他们能用合理的思考来支持我的问题,并能把我的问题对接成关于自己的有意义的陈述。

trans-unit.source: I think this is the minimal code to implement it:
trans-unit.target: 我想这是最起码的代码来实现。

trans-unit.source: IT IS POSSIBLE!
trans-unit.target: 有可能

trans-unit.source: If it is asked if it is possible (not MUST), it can ask "a" to return a random number. It would be true if it generates 1, 2, and 3 sequentially.
trans-unit.target: 如果问它是否可能(不是必须),它可以要求 "a "返回一个随机数。如果它依次产生1、2和3,则为真。

trans-unit.source: If you ever get such an interview question (or notice some equally unexpected behavior in your code) think about what kind of things could possibly cause a behavior that looks impossible at first glance:
trans-unit.target: 如果你曾经遇到这样的面试问题(或者在你的代码中注意到一些同样出乎意料的行为),请想一想,到底是什么样的事情可能导致了一个看起来不可能的行为。

trans-unit.source: If you just see top side of my code and run it you say WOW, how?
trans-unit.target: 如果你只是看到我的代码顶面运行,你说WOW,如何?

trans-unit.source: If you take advantage of how == works, you could simply create an object with a custom toString (or valueOf) function that changes what it returns each time it is used such that it satisfies all three conditions.
trans-unit.target: 如果你趁如何 == 作品，你可以简单地创建一个自定义对象 toString （或 valueOf ）函数，改变它使用它，使得它满足所有这三个条件，每次返回。

trans-unit.source: In JavaScript, there are no integers but only Numbers, which are implemented as double precision floating point numbers.
trans-unit.target: 在JavaScript中，没有整数，只有 Number ，它们被实现为双精度浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Is it ever possible that (a== 1 && a ==2 && a==3) could evaluate to true in JavaScript?
trans-unit.target: 有没有可能是 (a== 1 && a ==2 && a==3) 计算结果可能 true 在JavaScript？

trans-unit.source: It can be accomplished using the following in the global scope. For nodejs use global instead of window in the code below.
trans-unit.target: 可以在全局范围内使用以下内容来实现。对于 nodejs ，请在以下代码中使用 global 而不是 window 。

trans-unit.source: It means that if a Number a is large enough, it can be considered equal to three consecutive integers:
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果Number a 足够大，则可以认为它等于三个连续的整数：

trans-unit.source: It works because of custom valueOf method that is called when Object compared with primitive (such as Number). Main trick is that a.valueOf returns new value every time because it's calling exec on regular expression with g flag, which causing updating lastIndex of that regular expression every time match is found. So first time this.r.lastIndex == 0, it matches 1 and updates lastIndex: this.r.lastIndex == 1, so next time regex will match 2 and so on.
trans-unit.target: 之所以起作用，是因为将Object与原始值（例如Number）进行比较时会调用自定义 valueOf 方法。主要技巧是 a.valueOf 每次都会返回新值，因为它使用 g 标志在正则表达式上调用 exec ，这会导致每次找到匹配项时都会更新该正则表达式的 lastIndex 。因此，第一次 this.r.lastIndex == 0 ，它匹配 1 并更新 lastIndex ： this.r.lastIndex == 1 ，因此下一次正则表达式将匹配 2 ，依此类推。

trans-unit.target: 可以修改Java Integer 缓存：

trans-unit.source: JavaScript with web workers is a bit different, as you can have multiple threads. @mehulmpt has shown us a great proof-of-concept using web workers.
trans-unit.target: Web Worker的JavaScript有点不同，因为您可以有多个线程。@mehulmpt 使用Web worker向我们展示了一个很棒的概念证明。

trans-unit.source: Multi-threading and mutable state can be problematic.
trans-unit.target: 多线程和可突变状态可能会出现问题。

trans-unit.source: My idea started from how Number object type equation works.
trans-unit.target: 我的想法是从Number对象类型方程的工作原理出发。

trans-unit.source: No need for hidden character trickery.
trans-unit.target: 不需要隐藏角色的诡计。

trans-unit.source: Not doing character encoding and string processing right can lead to nasty bugs.
trans-unit.target: 不正确地进行字符编码和字符串处理可能会导致讨厌的BUG。

trans-unit.source: Note that therefore JavaScript is also not free from race conditions just because it is single-threaded. See here for a simple single-threaded – but async – example. In the context of an single statement the race condition however would be rather hard to hit in JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，因此JavaScript也不仅仅因为它是单线程而摆脱了竞争条件。有关简单的单线程但异步的示例，请参见此处。但是，在单个语句的上下文中，使用JavaScript很难达到竞争条件。

trans-unit.source: Note the weird spacing in the if statement (that I copied from your question). It is the half-width Hangul (that's Korean for those not familiar) which is an Unicode space character that is not interpreted by ECMA script as a space character - this means that it is a valid character for an identifier. Therefore there are three completely different variables, one with the Hangul after the a, one with it before and the last one with just a. Replacing the space with _ for readability, the same code would look like this:
trans-unit.target: 注意 if 语句（我从您的问题中复制的）中的怪异间隔。这是半角的韩文（对于不熟悉的人来说是韩文），是Unicode空格字符，不会被ECMA脚本解释为空格字符-这意味着它是标识符的有效字符。因此，存在三个完全不同的变量，一个变量在a后面是韩文，一个变量在前是a，最后一个变量是a。为了便于阅读，用 _ 代替空格，相同的代码如下所示：

trans-unit.target: 当然,这里的面试题和样题看起来都很有构思。但它们都很好地提醒了我们。

trans-unit.target: 在我的MacBook Air上,在第一次尝试时,大约经过100亿次的迭代后就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.target: 或增加 a ：

trans-unit.source: Other tricks are possible using the same idea e.g. by using Unicode variation selectors to create variables that look exactly alike (a︀ = 1; a︁ = 2; a︀ == 1 && a︁ == 2; // true).
trans-unit.target: 使用相同的想法也可以使用其他技巧，例如，使用Unicode变体选择器创建看起来完全相似的变量（ a︀ = 1; a︁ = 2; a︀ == 1 && a︁ == 2; // true ）。

trans-unit.source: Proxies basically pretend to be a target object (the first parameter), but intercept operations on the target object (in this case the "get property" operation) so that there is an opportunity to do something other than the default object behavior. In this case the "get property" action is called on a when == coerces its type in order to compare it to each number. This happens:
trans-unit.target: 代理基本上假装为目标对象（第一个参数），但是拦截对目标对象的操作（在本例中为“获取属性”操作），因此有机会进行默认对象行为以外的操作。在这种情况下，“获取属性”动作叫上 a 当 == 强求为了把它比作每个号码的类型。有时候是这样的：

trans-unit.source: Python
trans-unit.target: Python

trans-unit.target: Ruby

trans-unit.source: Rule number one of interviews; never say impossible.
trans-unit.target: 面试的第一条;绝不说不可能。

trans-unit.source: Same, but different, but still same (can be "tested" multiple times):
trans-unit.target: 相同,但不一样,但还是一样(可以多次 "测试")。

trans-unit.source: Second attempt:
trans-unit.target: 第二次尝试。

trans-unit.source: Side-effects can get really nasty and that a well-designed program should be free from unwanted side-effects.
trans-unit.target: 副作用可能会变得非常讨厌,一个设计良好的程序应该没有不必要的副作用。

trans-unit.source: So I think it is enough to say Yes, it is possible to someone that said to you: Nothing is impossible
trans-unit.target: 所以我认为只要说“ 是”就足够了，可能有人对你说：没有什么是不可能的

trans-unit.source: So:
trans-unit.target: So:

trans-unit.source: The Proxy intercepts getting the a[Symbol.toPrimitive] function using the "get handler"
trans-unit.target: 代理使用“获取处理程序” 拦截获取 a[Symbol.toPrimitive] 函数

trans-unit.source: The Proxy's "get handler" checks that the property being gotten is Symbol.toPrimitive, in which case it increments and then returns the counter from the target object: ++target.i. If a different property is being retrieved, we just fall back to returning the default property value, target[name]
trans-unit.target: 代理的“获取处理程序”检查所获取的属性为 Symbol.toPrimitive ，在这种情况下，该属性将递增，然后从目标对象 ++target.i 返回计数器。如果要检索其他属性，我们将退回到返回默认属性值 target[name]

trans-unit.source: The above code is a short version (thanks to @Forivin for its note in comments) and the following code is original:
trans-unit.target: 以上代码是一个简短的版本(感谢@Forivin在评论中的注释),以下代码为原创。

trans-unit.source: The generic term for this is "homoglyphs": different unicode characters that look the same. Typically hard to get three that are utterly indistinguishable, but in some cases you can get lucky. A, Α, А, and Ꭺ would work better (Latin-A, Greek Alpha, Cyrillic-A, and Cherokee-A respectively; unfortunately the Greek and Cherokee lower-case letters are too different from the Latin a: α,ꭺ, and so doesn't help with the above snippet).
trans-unit.target: 通用术语是“象形文字”：看起来相同的不同unicode字符。通常很难获得完全无法区分的三个，但是在某些情况下您会很幸运。 A，Α，А和Ꭺ会更好地工作（分别为拉丁字母A，希腊字母Alpha，西里尔字母A和切诺基-A；不幸的是，希腊字母和切诺基小写字母与拉丁字母 a 太不同了： α ， ꭺ ，因此对以上代码片段无济于事。

trans-unit.source: The reason this works is due to the use of the loose equality operator. When using loose equality, if one of the operands is of a different type than the other, the engine will attempt to convert one to the other. In the case of an object on the left and a number on the right, it will attempt to convert the object to a number by first calling valueOf if it is callable, and failing that, it will call toString. I used toString in this case simply because it's what came to mind, valueOf would make more sense. If I instead returned a string from toString, the engine would have then attempted to convert the string to a number giving us the same end result, though with a slightly longer path.
trans-unit.target: 之所以起作用，是因为使用了松散的相等运算符。使用宽松相等时，如果其中一个操作数的类型不同于另一个，则引擎将尝试将一个转换为另一个。对于左侧的对象和右侧的数字，它将尝试通过首先调用 valueOf (如果可以调用）将对象转换为数字，如果失败，则将调用 toString 。在这种情况下，我之所以使用 toString 只是因为这是我想到的， valueOf 会更有意义。如果我改为从 toString 返回一个字符串，则引擎将尝试将该字符串转换为给我们相同最终结果的数字，尽管路径略长。

trans-unit.source: There's an entire class of Homoglyph Attacks out there, most commonly in fake domain names (eg. wikipediа.org (Cyrillic) vs wikipedia.org (Latin)), but it can show up in code as well; typically referred to as being underhanded (as mentioned in a comment, [underhanded] questions are now off-topic on PPCG, but used to be a type of challenge where these sorts of things would show up). I used this website to find the homoglyphs used for this answer.
trans-unit.target: 这里有一整类的象形文字攻击，最常见的是假域名（例如 wikipediа.org （西里尔文）与 wikipedia.org （拉丁文）），但它也可以显示在代码中；通常称为不熟练的人（如评论中提到的，[ 不熟练的人]问题现在在PPCG上不合时宜，但曾经是这类事情会出现的一种挑战）。我使用该网站找到用于此答案的同形文字。

trans-unit.source: Therefore the console.log will fire and output (in my terminal anyways) Thing: { value: 4}, indicating the conditional was true.
trans-unit.target: 因此，console.log将触发并输出（无论如何在我的终端中） Thing: { value: 4} ，指示条件为true。

trans-unit.source: These kind of issues can appear in many programming languages, not only JavaScript, so we aren't seeing one of the classical JavaScript WTFs here1.
trans-unit.target: 这些类型的问题可以出现在很多编程语言，不仅JavaScript，因此我们没有看到经典的一个JavaScript的WTFs这里1。

trans-unit.source: This answer abuses the implicit variables provided by the global scope in the execution context by defining a getter to retrieve the variable.
trans-unit.target: 这个答案滥用了执行上下文中的全局作用域提供的隐含变量,通过定义一个获取器来获取变量。

trans-unit.source: This can be an example of race condition in multi-threaded environment provided by web workers and SharedArrayBuffer in JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是Web工作者和JavaScript中的SharedArrayBuffer提供的多线程环境下的竞赛条件的一个例子。

trans-unit.source: This is also possible using a series of self-overwriting getters:
trans-unit.target: 这也是可以用一系列的自编自写的获取器来实现的。

trans-unit.source: This is an interview question asked by a major tech company. It happened two weeks back, but I'm still trying to find the answer. I know we never write such code in our day-to-day job, but I'm curious.
trans-unit.target: 这是一家大型科技公司的面试问题。这事发生在两周前,但我还在努力寻找答案。我知道我们日常工作中从来不会写这样的代码,但我很好奇。

trans-unit.source: This is an inverted version of @Jeff's answer* where a hidden character (U+115F, U+1160 or U+3164) is used to create variables that look like 1, 2 and 3.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个倒置的版本@杰夫的回答 *其中隐藏字符（U + 115F，U + 1160或U + 3164），用于创建变量看起来像 1 ， 2 和 3 。

trans-unit.source: This is possible in case of variable a being accessed by, say 2 web workers through a SharedArrayBuffer as well as some main script. The possibility is low, but it is possible that when the code is compiled to machine code, the web workers update the variable a just in time so the conditions a==1, a==2 and a==3 are satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 例如，两个Web工作者通过SharedArrayBuffer以及一些主脚本访问变量 a 时，这是可能的。可能性很小，但是有可能在将代码编译为机器代码时，Web工作人员会及时更新变量 a ，因此满足条件 a==1 ， a==2 和 a==3 。

trans-unit.source: This one uses the defineProperty with a nice side-effect causing global variable!
trans-unit.target: 这个使用了defineProperty,有一个很好的副作用导致全局变量!

trans-unit.source: This type coercion results in calling a[Symbol.toPrimitive]() internally
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的强制导致内部调用 a[Symbol.toPrimitive]()

trans-unit.source: This uses a getter inside of a with statement to let a evaluate to three different values.
trans-unit.target: 它使用的一个getter中 with 的语句让 a 评估，以三个不同的值。

trans-unit.source: This works because == invokes toString which calls .join for Arrays.
trans-unit.target: 这是 .join ，因为 == 会调用 toString ，后者会为数组调用.join。

trans-unit.source: This would look like the following:
trans-unit.target: 这将看起来像下面这样:

trans-unit.source: Tip: If it takes too long on your system. Try only a == 1 && a == 2 and change Math.random()*3 to Math.random()*2. Adding more and more to list drops the chance of hitting.
trans-unit.target: 提示：如果您的系统花费的时间太长。仅尝试 a == 1 && a == 2 并将 Math.random()*3 更改为 Math.random()*2 。在列表中添加越来越多的内容会降低命中率。

trans-unit.source: Trick: I used a hidden character after if to make a function that its name is similar to if. In JavaScript we can not override keywords so I forced to use this way. It is a fake if, but it works for you in this case!
trans-unit.target: 绝招：我在 if 之后使用了一个隐藏字符，以使其功能类似于 if 。在JavaScript中，我们无法覆盖关键字，因此我不得不使用这种方式。 if 是假的，但在这种情况下对您有用！

trans-unit.source: True, it's not exactly what the interviewer asked (it doesn't work with a=0), but it doesn't involve any trick with hidden functions or operator overloading.
trans-unit.target: 的确，这与面试官的要求不完全相同（不适用于 a=0 ），但不涉及隐藏函数或运算符重载的任何技巧。

trans-unit.source: Using Proxies:
trans-unit.target: 使用代理：

trans-unit.source: Using ES6 classes it would look like this
trans-unit.target: 使用ES6类,它看起来像这样

trans-unit.source: We create a Proxy for the target object and assign it to a
trans-unit.target: 我们为目标对象创建代理并将其分配给 a

trans-unit.source: We create a target object, { i: 0 }, where the i property is our counter
trans-unit.target: 我们创建一个目标对象 { i: 0 } ，其中 i 属性是我们的计数器

trans-unit.source: What happens is that valueOf is called in each comparison operator. On the first one, a will equal 1, on the second, a will equal 2, and so on and so forth, because each time valueOf is called, the value of a is incremented.
trans-unit.target: 发生的是在每个比较运算符中调用了 valueOf 。上的第一个， a 将等于 1 ，在第二， a 将等于 2 ，等等等等，因为每次 valueOf 被调用时，的值 a 递增。

trans-unit.source: When you can't do anything without regular expressions:
trans-unit.target: 当你没有正则表达式就什么都做不了的时候。

trans-unit.target: 使用自定义 == ：

trans-unit.source: Yes, it is possible! 😎
trans-unit.target: 是的,这是有可能的! 😎

trans-unit.source: You might notice a slight discrepancy with the second one, but the first and third are identical to the naked eye. All 3 are distinct characters:
trans-unit.target: 你可能会发现和第二种有一点不一样的地方,但第一种和第三种的肉眼看是一样的。3个都是截然不同的人物。
